name: Can Knockdown Can Striker Game Free
name_original: Can Knockdown Can Striker Game Free
description:
Can you Knock Down? Yes, of-course you can! Or should we say: yes we can..... knock the can!

The most addictive and 100% FREE game for iPhone and iPad. Become an expert Can Knocker while aiming at and knocking down piles and pyramids of 3D Cans! Start playing and you just won't put down this marvelous title till you drain your battery empty!

> Multiple levels are added, multiple scenes for more joy and addiction.
> Stunning Graphics for iPhone and iPad smartphones.
> Different Places to play like in Steel Mills, Car Workshop, Rainy Street and Robotic Mills.

Important notice:
If you see the game lagging, please continue playing. It should get smoother as you replay the same level again. This is 100% FREE Version. Please don't forget to send your feedback and ratings.
